skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Skilled in creating responsive and user-friendly web interfaces. Experience with modern frontend frameworks like React js.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Experienced in server-side languages such as Java (with Spring Boot) and .Net. Proficient in database management using SQL and NoSQL databases.

skills.title: Database Management
skills.description: Experienced in designing and optimizing database schemas. Skilled in SQL query optimization. Familiar with both relational and NoSQL databases.

skills.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
skills.description: Skilled in writing unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Experience with testing frameworks such Selenium.

portfolio.title: TrekHub
portfolio.description: TrekHub is a webapplication. Designed for trekkers and trekking organization. Developed using java, springboot, Dot-net, reactjs.

portfolio.title: Constro
portfolio.description: Constro is a static web pages. It showcases various static web design elements and serves as a portfolio piece to demonstrate web design skills.

portfolio.title: Beat Bloom
portfolio.description: BeatBloom Player is a sleek and responsive static music player built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.BeatBloom Player offers an immersive way to enjoy your music library.
